name: "New Trend Alert" Toko Kirigaya
text: 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] If you have another 《Anniversary》 or 《Morfonica》 character, put this card into your stock. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, search your deck for up to 1 《Anniversary》 or 《Morfonica》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: I just knew it when I saw it.

name: "My Courage" Kanon Matsubara
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have another yellow character, this card gets +3000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Transformation Technique?" is placed on your climax area, if you have 2 or more other yellow characters, this card gets the following abilities until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, this card cannot become 【REVERSE】." "【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step."
flavorText: I hope we've been able to give you many things, just like Hello, Happy World! has given me.

name: "Smiles Connect Us All" Kokoro Tsurumaki
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "To That Joyous Place!" is in your climax area, and you have 4 or more other 《Anniversary》 or 《Hello, Happy World!》 characters, put the bottom 4 cards of your opponent's deck into their waiting room, and deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to the number of cards with in its trigger icon among those cards. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: The fun I love the most happens when I'm with Hello, Happy World!

name: "A Pop-Up Book" Kokoro Tsurumaki
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose 1 card from among them, put it on the top of your deck, and put the rest into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you do not have another character in your back stage, you may put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a level 0 or lower character, put that character in any position of your back stage.
flavorText: That's super fantastic!

name: "Step of Determination" Kanon Matsubara
text: 【CONT】 【CXCOMBO】 If "Transformation Technique?" is in your climax area, this card in all of your zones get the trigger icon . 【CONT】 You may choose "Here We Go, Guys!" in your waiting room with the effect of . 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Excuse me~! Let me through!

name: "Prize Collection" Nanami Hiromachi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your opponent's characters and 1 trait of that character, and that character loses all of that trait until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Anniversary》 or 《Morfonica》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: I should check out this store.

name: "Once a Millennium Night" Misaki Okusawa
text: 【CONT】 If your level is 2 or higher or there is a marker underneath this card, during your turn, all of your other 《Anniversary》 or 《Hello, Happy World!》 characters get +X power. X is equal to your level ×1000. 【AUTO】 When your character's trigger check reveals a climax with in its trigger icon, choose up to 1 card in your opponent's waiting room, put it at the bottom of their deck, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: So if you're a shooting star, then so are we. If you're going to fly across the night sky, we'll be right there, flying along with you.

name: "Follow Your Heart" Kaoru Seta
text: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 4 or more other 《Anniversary》 or 《Hello, Happy World!》 characters, you may pay the cost. If you do, your opponent returns all cards from their stock to their deck, shuffles their deck, and puts the same number of cards from the top of their deck into their stock.
flavorText: The most important things are those one takes for granted... I agree with this sentiment.

name: "With These Hands" Eve Wakamiya
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1500 power for each other 《Anniversary》 or 《Pastel＊Palettes》 character in your back stage. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "First-Rate Hospitality" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, you may choose 1 of your other 《Anniversary》 or 《Pastel＊Palettes》 characters, and 【STAND】 it. 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of the encore step, if you do not have another 【REST】 character in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【REST】 this card.
flavorText: We must muster our courage and see what people are saying!

name: "A New Friend" Hagumi Kitazawa
text: 【CONT】 If your waiting room has 2 or less climax, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose up to 1 yellow character in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and perform the following action. "You may choose 1 of your opponent's level 1 or higher characters. If you do, your opponent chooses 1 level X or lower character in their waiting room, and exchanges them. X is equal to the level of the character you chose -1."
flavorText: Eat one with me, Nico-rin! They're fresh out the fryer, so I bet they'll be really yummy!

name: "We're Here~!!" Hagumi Kitazawa
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 2 《Anniversary》 or 《Hello, Happy World!》 characters from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your stock in any order.
flavorText: Ta-dah~! Look, look! It's my monkey stuffed animal~!

name: "A Lucky Find" Eve Wakamiya
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a level 0 or lower character among those cards, this card's soul does not decrease by side attacking until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Picture Perfect?" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: That's a great idea! Actually, there were a couple stalls I wanted to check out!

name: "A Solid Player" Misaki Okusawa
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have another 《Anniversary》 or 《Hello, Happy World!》 character, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 2, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I'll start off slow. Hup…

name: "First Candy Shop Visit" Nanami Hiromachi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Anniversary》 or 《Morfonica》 characters you have ×500. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 level 0 or lower character in your waiting room, and put it in any position of your stage.
flavorText: Now I'm even more pumped up~.

name: "A Fleeting Performance" Kaoru Seta
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put the bottom card of your opponent's stock into their waiting room.
flavorText: A curse upon you... A curse upon this world...!!

name: "Strike a Pose☆" Toko Kirigaya
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each character in your opponent's back stage. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or waiting room, this card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When the damage dealt by this card is canceled, you may deal 1 damage to your opponent." (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: All sorts of people were there, so it'd be a waste if I didn't talk to them!

name: "Late-Night Talk" Misaki Okusawa
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Anniversary》 or 《Hello, Happy World!》 characters get +500 power. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] If there are no markers underneath this card, choose 1 ""Once a Millennium Night" Misaki Okusawa" in your waiting room, and put it face up underneath this card as a marker. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose this card and 1 ""Once a Millennium Night" Misaki Okusawa" marker underneath this card, and exchange them. If you do, at the end of the turn, exchange those characters.
flavorText: Good spirits, huh...? It might actually be that simple.

name: "Beyond Frustration" Toko Kirigaya
text: 【AUTO】 When your other 《Anniversary》 or 《Morfonica》 character attacks, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Anniversary》 or 《Morfonica》 character from your waiting room at the bottom of your clock] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, move this card to an open position of your back stage. 【AUTO】 Change [Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 ""New Trend Alert" Toko Kirigaya" in your waiting room, and put it in the stage position that this card was in.
flavorText: I don't know about that... But it looks like Rui's been doing a lot of stuff to get to where she is.

name: "The Lead Role" Kaoru Seta
text: 【AUTO】 [Put the top card of your stock into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 cost 0 or lower 《Anniversary》 or 《Hello, Happy World!》 character with level equal to or lower than your level, put it in any position of your stage, and shuffle your deck. 【AUTO】 When your other 《Anniversary》 or 《Hello, Happy World!》 character attacks, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: All of you have toiled long and hard for this play. I shall deliver an outstanding performance worthy of your efforts.

name: "Himari Style" Hagumi Kitazawa
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have another 《Anniversary》 or 《Hello, Happy World!》 character, this card gets +3000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [Return 2 《Anniversary》 or 《Hello, Happy World!》 characters from your waiting room to your deck & Shuffle your deck] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your 《Anniversary》 or 《Hello, Happy World!》 characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I've gotcha covered! Ta-da!

name: "Shining Through the Rain" Kokoro Tsurumaki
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is an 《Anniversary》 or 《Hello, Happy World!》 character, put it into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. (Otherwise, return it to its original place) 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2000, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Soi-ya~!!

name: "An Unkeepable Secret" Nanami Hiromachi
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, put that character into your opponent's memory." 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Pure luck~

name: "Hearts in Full Bloom" Kanon Matsubara
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1500 power for each of your other 《Anniversary》 or 《Hello, Happy World!》 characters. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 climax from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. If you put 1 card into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavorText: Fufu. Thank you, Maya-chan.

name: "The Director's Assistant" Aya Maruyama
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +X power. X is equal to the number of colors your characters in your stage have ×1000. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 4 or more other 《Pastel＊Palettes》 characters, you may pay the cost. If you do, your opponent chooses 1 climax in their waiting room, returns all cards except that card from their waiting room to their deck, and shuffles their deck.
flavorText: Any other places that need newspaper laid down?!

name: Here We Go, Guys!
text: 【REST】 1 of your 【STAND】 characters. If you do, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Anniversary》 or 《Hello, Happy World!》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step."
flavorText: Kokoro: "More & more smiles!"

name: Picture Perfect?
text: Brainstorm Flip over 3 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. Choose 1 level X or lower 《Anniversary》 or 《Pastel＊Palettes》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the number of 《Anniversary》 or 《Pastel＊Palettes》 characters among those cards. Put this card into your memory. 【CONT】 Memory If this card is in your memory, all of your 《Anniversary》 or 《Pastel＊Palettes》 characters in your hand get the following ability. "【CONT】 This card can be played from your hand without fulfilling color requirements."
flavorText: I can already see the posts now, "Maruyama screwed up again~"!

name: To That Joyous Place!
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)
flavorText: Kokoro: "C'mon, let's go!"

name: Transformation Technique?
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)
flavorText: Kanon: "It does sound like it'd be a fun party."

name: "Finding the Answer" Moca Aoba
text: 【AUTO】 [Put the top card of your stock into your clock] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 level 1 or lower character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. 【AUTO】 【CLOCK】 Alarm If this card is the top card of your clock, at the beginning of your climax phase, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into their waiting room. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock."
flavorText: ...If there's something on your mind, I'd be happier if you told me instead of worrying about it by yourself~

name: "Bands Really Are..." LOCK
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 level 0 or lower card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Anniversary》 or 《RAISE A SUILEN》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. (Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText: This is... truly... the girls band era!

name: "Star Beginning to Shine" LAYER
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 At the end of this card's attack, if "A Tasty Time" is in your climax area, you have 2 or more other 《Anniversary》 or 《RAISE A SUILEN》 characters, and there is no character facing this card or the character facing this card is 【REVERSE】, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Anniversary》 or 《RAISE A SUILEN》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Right here, right now... These cheers are for us.

name: "Rebellious Spirit" Ran Mitake
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Staying True to Us" is in your climax area, and all of your characters are 《Anniversary》 or 《Afterglow》, deal 1 damage to your opponent, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 2 cards from among them, put them on the top of your deck in any order, and put the rest into your waiting room. (Damage may be canceled) 【AUTO】 During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, at the beginning of the encore step, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.
flavorText: We're in this band for our own purpose, not yours!!

name: "There, Perfect!" Aya Maruyama
text: 【CONT】 Your other character in the middle position of your center stage gets +500 power. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 《Anniversary》 or 《Pastel＊Palettes》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. If the total number of colors put into your waiting room by this effect is 4 or more, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock.
flavorText: Ehehe, you should. They're really easy to make, and they look so cute♪

name: "Rupturing the Night" MASKING
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 2 or more other 《Anniversary》 or 《RAISE A SUILEN》 characters, you may draw 1 card. If you do, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, search your deck for up to 1 《Anniversary》 or 《RAISE A SUILEN》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: MASKING: "We're comin' for ya, PAREO!"

name: "I'll Defend My Friends" Tomoe Udagawa
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When your climax is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 "Searching Together" or 《Anniversary》 or 《Afterglow》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 1 "Things I Can't Describe" from your climax area into your waiting room] At the beginning of your encore step, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Searching Together" or 《Anniversary》 or 《Afterglow》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: If you have something to say, I'm happy to listen. But I won't stay silent while you make my bandmate cry.

name: "The Usual Shtick" Himari Uehara
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your climax phase, if the top card of your clock is a card with "Alarm", this card gets +1500 power and the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【AUTO】 When this card attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 1 or higher, put it into your stock." (Otherwise, return it to its original place. Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText: Hey, hey, hoh~!

name: "The Grand Night Sky" Ran Mitake
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your climax phase, if the top card of your clock is a card with "Alarm", this card gets "【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +2500 power." until the end of your opponent's next turn. 【AUTO】 【CLOCK】 Alarm If this card is the top card of your clock, at the beginning of your climax phase, perform the following action 2 times. "Choose 1 of your 《Anniversary》 or 《Afterglow》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn."
flavorText: Ran: "...You know, this is really embarrassing...!"

name: "Guide to the Underworld" Moca Aoba
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, return all cards from your waiting room to your deck, and shuffle your deck. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your climax phase, if the top card of your clock is a card with "Alarm", this card gets +6000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Oh~, you're such a modest girl~

name: "I Will Never Give Up" Tsugumi Hazawa
text: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more 《Anniversary》 or 《Afterglow》 characters, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Anniversary》 or 《Afterglow》 characters, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the bottom card of your clock into your stock.
flavorText: I want to make it so that we can all enjoy being in this band again.

name: "Stargazing in December" Tsugumi Hazawa
text: 【AUTO】 【CLOCK】 Alarm If this card is the top card of your clock, at the beginning of your main phase, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 event from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. If you put 1 card into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. 【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Anniversary》 or 《Afterglow》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText:
It must be nice to have a big sister.
I'm a little jealous, being an only child and all.

name: "A Daughter's Cooking" MASKING
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 level 0 or lower character in your opponent's center stage, and return it to their hand. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: I mean, I never had a place I could really let loose before I joined RAS.

name: "Gotta Be Black Coffee" LAYER
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1500 power for each of your other 《Anniversary》 or 《RAISE A SUILEN》 characters. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into their waiting room. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock.
flavorText: LAYER: "...I think she would pick this one."

name: "High Energy!" Himari Uehara
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CLOCK】 Alarm If this card is the top card of your clock, and you have 4 or more 《Anniversary》 or 《Afterglow》 characters, at the beginning of your climax phase, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into their waiting room. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock."
flavorText: That's so cool...!

name: "The Thrill of Taiko" Tomoe Udagawa
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 《Anniversary》 or 《Afterglow》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 [(2) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 2 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Alright, everyone! On three, we start with our chant!! One... Two... Three!!

name: "Rokka's All" LOCK
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 other 《Anniversary》 or 《RAISE A SUILEN》 character from your stage into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, choose up to 1 card from the remaining cards, put it into your stock, and put the rest into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 [(3)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, your opponent puts all of their stock into their waiting room, and puts the same number of cards from the top of their deck into their stock.
flavorText: I just have to give it my all... and play!

name: "Relaxing Sakura Party" Ran Mitake
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Anniversary》 or 《Afterglow》 character in your clock, return it to your hand, and put the top card of your deck into your clock.
flavorText: They're definitely easier to eat than a salad. In fact, doesn't that make them perfect for a picnic like this...?

name: "Storm in a Sound Booth" LAYER
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is "My First Celebration" or an 《Anniversary》 or 《RAISE A SUILEN》 character, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn. (Return the revealed card to its original place) 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Anniversary》 or 《RAISE A SUILEN》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: If I haven't gotten through to you, there's no point! Listen to me again...! Because I don't feel like stopping!

name: "Getting Along" Himari Uehara
text: 【CONT】 If there is a marker underneath this card, this card gets +1500 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, choose 1 《Anniversary》 or 《Afterglow》 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is "Searching Together" or an 《Anniversary》 or 《Afterglow》 character, you may put it face down underneath this card as a marker. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)
flavorText:
Wow~! Look at them all! And they're all for different shops too!
Which one should I look at first~?

name: "A Mysterious Beauty" Moca Aoba
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if you have an 《Anniversary》 or 《Afterglow》 character, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1000, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Do you want to know why... Minato-san's so strict with you?

name: "A Model Idol" Chisato Shirasagi
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Anniversary》 or 《Pastel＊Palettes》 characters, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 climax with the same card name as a climax in your waiting room, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: As for myself, I believe I would push the button after considering the possible outcomes. Although it states that there is no risk, it's best to remain vigilant.

name: "A Thrilling Development?!" Tsugumi Hazawa
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is "Searching Together" or an 《Anniversary》 or 《Afterglow》 character, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn. (Return the revealed card to its original place) 【AUTO】 【CLOCK】 Alarm If this card is the top card of your clock, and your level is 1 or higher, at the beginning of your climax phase, you may choose this card and 1 of your characters, and exchange them.
flavorText: Ah... S-sorry... I didn't see your hand there...

name: "A Big Sister's Pride" Tomoe Udagawa
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if the top card of your clock is a card with "Alarm", this card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Anniversary》 or 《Afterglow》 characters. 【AUTO】 【CLOCK】 Alarm [(1) Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] If this card is the top card of your clock, at the beginning of your main phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText:
I want... to always be Ako's big sister.
Maybe she won't think of me as someone she can rely on, but-

name: "Through Our Connection" MASKING
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Anniversary》 or 《RAISE A SUILEN》 characters. 【AUTO】 Accelerate [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 ""Star Beginning to Shine" LAYER" or ""Through Our Connection" MASKING" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: ... Hey, let's bring the other guys here some other time. We can take a photo here together.

name: "Join the Astronomy Club" Hina Hikawa
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 ""Join the Astronomy Club" Hina Hikawa" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: I've prepared lots of fun stuff! Please, take your time!

name: "Lock On!" LOCK
text: 【CONT】 If this card is in the middle position of your center stage, this card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Anniversary》 or 《RAISE A SUILEN》 characters. 【AUTO】 Accelerate [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, if your level is 2 or higher, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets the following abilities until end of turn. "【CONT】 Great Performance" "【AUTO】 [(1) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【REST】 this card, and 【REVERSE】 this card's battle opponent."
flavorText: I haven't played this one in a while, so I might be a bit rusty.

name: "Eureka! Treasure!" Maya Yamato
text: 【CONT】 This card cannot side attack. 【CONT】 This card gets +X power. X is equal to the total number of colors your characters in your stage have ×1000.
flavorText: I'll just have to follow your example then! From now on, I'll add even more pictures of equipment I-

name: My First Celebration
text: 【COUNTER】 Choose up to 1 character in your opponent's back stage, return it to their hand, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. Put this card at the bottom of your deck.
flavorText: I think I'm going to hold on to mine. I want something to remember today by.

name: Searching Together
text: Choose up to 2 《Anniversary》 or 《Afterglow》 characters in your waiting room, return them to your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. You may choose the top card of your clock and 1 《Anniversary》 or 《Afterglow》 character in your waiting room, and exchange them.
flavorText: Does that mean you dropped the case itself somewhere?

name: Staying True to Us
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText: Ran: "Are they all here for Girls Band Expo?"

name: Things I Can't Describe
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to 1 level 1 or lower character in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: Tomoe: "You said we could "all put our heads together" for this one, right Tsugu?"

name: A Tasty Time
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText: LAYER: "You always ask to meet on such short notice, Hana-chan."

name: "Poppin'Party's Strength" Saya Yamabuki
text: 【CONT】 Your events can be played from your hand without fulfilling color requirements. 【AUTO】 When your climax is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 《Anniversary》 or 《Poppin'Party》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Saya: "Hey, part of what's great about Poppin'Party is how we can jump in head first, isn't it?"

name: "Unbearable Emotion" Chisato Shirasagi
text: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more 《Anniversary》 or 《Pastel＊Palettes》 characters, this card can be played from your hand without fulfilling color requirements, and this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Anniversary》 or 《Pastel＊Palettes》 characters. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 《Anniversary》 or 《Pastel＊Palettes》 character in your clock, and put it at the bottom of your deck.
flavorText: I do not want them to sing one of our songs! I will not give my permission!

name: "STAR☆" Kasumi Toyama
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if you have 2 or more other 《Anniversary》 or 《Poppin'Party》 characters, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or deck, draw up to 2 cards, choose 2 cards in your hand, put them into your waiting room, and put up to 1 card from the top of your deck into your stock. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(2)] At the end of this card's attack, if "At Long Last!" is in your climax area, and you have another 《Anniversary》 or 《Poppin'Party》 character, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 2 damage to your opponent, and until the end of your opponent's next turn, during this card's battle, you cannot receive damage by the 【AUTO】 effects of your opponent's characters. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: As far as we can... Right to the stars!

name: "Wrapped in Morning Glow" Aya Maruyama
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1) Put 1 "Pre-Show Excitement" from your climax area into your waiting room] During your climax phase, when this card is placed on the stage by the effect of "Pre-Show Excitement", you may pay the cost. If you do, 【STAND】 this card, choose up to 2 cards in your opponent's waiting room, return them to their deck, and your opponent shuffles their deck. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is "Picture Perfect?" or an 《Anniversary》 or 《Pastel＊Palettes》 character, you may deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled. Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: Wow! Look, guys! It's such a beautiful sunrise! It's so bright~

name: "Downtown's Call" Kasumi Toyama
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 event from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 event in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.
flavorText: I knew downtown would be amazing in the evening!

name: "A Wonderful Assortment" Chisato Shirasagi
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 《Anniversary》 or 《Pastel＊Palettes》 character from your waiting room at the bottom of your clock] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 2 "Picture Perfect?" or 《Anniversary》 or 《Pastel＊Palettes》 characters from among them, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: I'll make sure to take good care of this dog bowl and mug.

name: "TRY!" Rimi Ushigome
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 level 1 or higher card from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. (Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText: Why don't we just try streaming a performance?

name: "Evening Primping" Saya Yamabuki
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your level 3 or higher characters in front of this card get +2000 power. 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When you play an event, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I guess if you're gonna keep on going on about it... Right, guys?

name: "Rough Measurements" Hina Hikawa
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is "Picture Perfect?" or an 《Anniversary》 or 《Pastel＊Palettes》 character, put it into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)
flavorText: She said 4- grams of sugar, so... Hmm~, that'd be about this size, I guess?

name: "Separated But Together" Rimi Ushigome
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 《Anniversary》 or 《Poppin'Party》 character from your stage into your waiting room] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and that character gets -1 soul until end of turn. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Rimi: "R-right now...? You'll embarrass me in front of everyone..."

name: "Melody of Hope" Kasumi Toyama
text: 【ACT】 [(2) 【REST】 this card and 1 of your ""There, Perfect!" Aya Maruyama"] Choose 1 of your 【STAND】 《Anniversary》 characters, and put it into your waiting room. If you do, look at up to 7 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Anniversary》 character from among them, put it in the stage position the character put into your waiting room by this effect was in, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Ehehe, I can't wait to play music with everybody~!

name: "To Protect Someone" Rimi Ushigome
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Anniversary》 or 《Poppin'Party》 characters. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if you played an event this turn, you may pay the cost. If you do, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step.
flavorText: It might be a toy, but it should still scare them off...! Once we have an opening, we'll make a run for it...

name: "Reassuring Friends" Saya Yamabuki
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and that character gets the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 This card cannot move to another position of the stage." 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put that character into your opponent's memory.
flavorText:
Saya: "Fufufu.
That would be~... a secret."

name: "Right in Half!" Eve Wakamiya
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Anniversary》 or 《Pastel＊Palettes》 characters, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: ... Stand aside, agents of mystery! Those who do not will feel the tempered edge of my bushido!

name: Living but Dead
text: 【COUNTER】 Choose 1 of your ""STAR☆" Kasumi Toyama", and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【CONT】 The character facing this card gets -3 soul."
flavorText: Instead of searching for a weapon, they need to get out of there fast!

name: At Long Last!
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Kasumi: "Alright, everybody, hold on tight! Let's go to the dome~!"

name: Pre-Show Excitement
text: 【AUTO】When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the【STANDBY】effect. (【STANDBY】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with a level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as【REST】)
flavorText: Aya: "There are T-shirts, towels, hats, wristbands... All the usual stuff. Looks like there are bands selling socks and other unique goods too!"

name: First-Rate Hospitality
text: 【AUTO】When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the【STANDBY】effect. (【STANDBY】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with a level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as【REST】)
flavorText: Eve: "Thank you, everyone...!"

name: "Are You Sure?" Lisa Imai
text: 【CONT】 If your hand has 5 or more cards, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is "Bridge of Emotions" or an 《Anniversary》 or 《Roselia》 character, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage.
flavorText: You have a proper reason for signing to a major label too, right?

name: "Alarmingly Elite School" Mashiro Kurata
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Anniversary》 or 《Morfonica》 characters, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "Bask in the Light" is in your climax area, and you have another 《Anniversary》 or 《Morfonica》 character, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Anniversary》 or 《Morfonica》 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, and this card gets the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【AUTO】 When this card is frontal attacked, you may return this card to your hand."
flavorText: Huh? Ah, h-hello...

name: "Path of the Blue Rose" Yukina Minato
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Our Future Destination" is in your climax area, and your hand has 5 or less cards, choose 1 of the following effects, and perform it. "Reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is "Bridge of Emotions" or an 《Anniversary》 or 《Roselia》 character, deal 4 damage to your opponent." "At the end of this card's attack, if the character facing this card is 【REVERSE】, you may put the top card of your stock into your waiting room. If you do, deal 2 damage to your opponent." (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Yes, so let's go down it. Toward the shining future of Roselia...!

name: "Who We Are Now" Arisa Ichigaya
text: 【CONT】 If this card is in your hand, this card gets 《Bonsai》. 【CONT】 If your hand has 5 or more cards, this card gets +2000 power and the following ability. "【CONT】 The character facing this card and this card cannot side attack." 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage with a character facing this card.
flavorText: We're here thanks to her. She's the reason Poppin'Party is here right now!

name: "VERSUS" Yukina Minato
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 Memory [Put this card from face up to face down] If this card is in your memory, at the end of the attack of your ""Path of the Blue Rose" Yukina Minato" or ""Rebellious Spirit" Ran Mitake", you may pay the cost. If you do, declare your deck or your waiting room. Search the zone you declared for up to 1 "Our Future Destination" or "Staying True to Us", choose 1 "Our Future Destination" or "Staying True to Us" in your climax area, and if those cards have different card names, exchange them. If you declared your deck, shuffle your deck. 【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your memory] Look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Anniversary》 or 《Roselia》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: Very well. We accept.

name: "To Where I Dream Of" Sayo Hikawa
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 《Anniversary》 or 《Roselia》 character from your waiting room at the bottom of your clock] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Bridge of Emotions" or 《Anniversary》 or 《Roselia》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: If debuting under a major label requires you to sacrifice your determination and beliefs... then that would mean now is not the time for Roselia to debut.

name: "Last-Minute Viewing" Lisa Imai
text: 【CONT】 Experience During your turn, if the total level of the cards in your level is 2 or higher, this card gets +X power. X is equal to this card's soul ×1000. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, choose 1 of your other characters, 【REST】 it, and move it to an open position of your back stage.
flavorText: All we have to do is excitedly wait!

name: "The Big Stage" Ako Udagawa
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or memory, this card gets +3000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 At the beginning of your encore step, if "Necromancer of the Abyss" is in your climax area, you may put this card into your memory. If you do, at the beginning of your next draw phase, choose 1 ""The Big Stage" Ako Udagawa" in your memory, put it in any position of your stage, and that character gets +3500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: To do the best show ever in front of loads of people!

name: "Heart-Pounding Sound" Tae Hanazono
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if you have another 《Anniversary》 or 《Poppin'Party》 character, this card gets +1500 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Bread-Carrying Race!" is in your climax area, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 2 level 1 or higher cards from among them, reveal them to your opponent, choose 1 card from the revealed cards, put it into your hand, choose 1 card from the revealed cards, put it into your stock, and put the rest into your waiting room. (Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText: I love the Rocking Star Festival so much that I want to go too!

name: "For Everyone" Maya Yamato
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to X cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 level 1 or higher card from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. If you put 1 card into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. X is equal to the total number of colors your characters in your stage have. (Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText: We're thinking of everyone who's chasing their dreams.

name: "A Brilliant Introduction!" Hina Hikawa
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Anniversary》 or 《Pastel＊Palettes》 characters get +X power. X is equal to the total number of colors your characters in your stage have ×500. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or at the bottom of your deck.
flavorText: Hina: "That brilliant and vibrant thing was my idea!"

name: "To a Brand New World" Rinko Shirokane
text: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more 《Anniversary》 or 《Roselia》 characters, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 Experience If the total level of the cards in your level is 4 or higher, this card gets +1500 power and the following ability. "【CONT】 This card cannot be chosen by your opponent's effects." 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, search your deck for up to 1 《Anniversary》 or 《Roselia》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: They're very beautiful... I can tell how much care was put into making them...

name: "As a Big Sister" Tsukushi Futaba
text: 【CONT】 If you have another 《Anniversary》 or 《Morfonica》 character, this card gets +1500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room]". 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Proof of My Skills!" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, and you have another 《Anniversary》 or 《Morfonica》 character, choose up to 1 《Anniversary》 or 《Morfonica》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it in any position of your stage. If you returned a character to your hand, deal 1 damage to your opponent. If you placed a character on your stage, that character gets +1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Huh?! Ah!

name: "To the Sea of Knowledge" Rui Yashio
text: 【CONT】 If your waiting room has 2 or less climax, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each other 《Anniversary》 or 《Morfonica》 character in your back stage. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by the 【AUTO】 effect of ""As a Big Sister" Tsukushi Futaba", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Anniversary》 or 《Morfonica》 character in your clock, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: I frequent the library because I am better able to focus there.

name: "Because You Were There" PAREO
text: 【AUTO】 During your opponent's turn, when the damage you received is not canceled, if this card is in your center stage, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 Accelerate [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] At the beginning of your climax phase, if your level is 3 or higher, and you have 2 or more other 《Anniversary》 or 《RAISE A SUILEN》 characters, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 ""Tears in the Closet" CHU²" in your waiting room, and put it in any position of your stage.
flavorText: PAREO: "Ohhh~! CHU²-sama~!"

name: "Tears in the Closet" CHU²
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by the 【AUTO】 effect of ""Because You Were There" PAREO", you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When "A Session with Everyone" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, all of your other characters get the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card attacks, put the bottom 2 cards of your opponent's deck into their waiting room. If there is a climax among those cards, deal 2 damage to your opponent." (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: I know... I don't have the talent to play an instrument... I'm not like Mom...

name: "A+ Leadership" Tsukushi Futaba
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 2 or more other 《Anniversary》 or 《Morfonica》 characters, you may draw 1 card. If you do, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Anniversary》 or 《Morfonica》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 "Translating Languages", reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Huh? Ehehe, not particularly~.

name: "Stage Director" Maya Yamato
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax among those cards, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [Return this card to your hand] When your climax is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Anyway, the actors are done with their meeting. We should begin the building process!

name: "I Want to Be Like You" Ako Udagawa
text: 【AUTO】 [【REST】 1 of your other 《Anniversary》 or 《Roselia》 characters] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 card in your level and 1 card in your waiting room, and exchange them. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: I've always looked up to her, though. She's the reason I work so hard... Now I don't know what to do.

name: "Welcome to the Party!" Mashiro Kurata
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, choose 1 of your other 《Anniversary》 or 《Morfonica》 characters, 【REST】 it, and move it to an open position of your back stage.
flavorText: Mashiro: "Erm, everyone, we've only just started our band, but... please take good care of us."

name: "Unknown Encounter" Rui Yashio
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, during that attack, this card gets +1000 power, and perform a trigger check 2 times during the trigger step.
flavorText: Rui: "No, that is not what I wanted to know-"

name: "Recruiting a Guitarist!" PAREO
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose up to 1 of your opponent's characters, put it into their memory, and your opponent puts that character from their memory in any position of their stage. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Anniversary》 or 《RAISE A SUILEN》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Anniversary》 or 《RAISE A SUILEN》 characters you have ×500.
flavorText: In that case, let us try over there!

name: "The Solo Wizard" Rinko Shirokane
text: 【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] Choose 1 ""Our Future Together" Yukina Minato" in your waiting room, put it in the stage position this card was in, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Anniversary》 or 《Roselia》 characters you have ×1000.
flavorText: Blind Curtain!!

name: "The Stars I Saw with You" Sayo Hikawa
text: 【CONT】 You may choose ""Path of the Blue Rose" Yukina Minato" or "Bridge of Emotions" in your waiting room with the effect of . 【CONT】 Assist All of your 《Anniversary》 or 《Roselia》 characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【AUTO】 When your climax is placed on your climax area, look at the top card of your deck, put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room, and if you have other cards named ""Path of the Blue Rose" Yukina Minato" and ""Rebellious Spirit" Ran Mitake", put up to 1 card from the bottom of your opponent's deck into their waiting room. If the card put into your opponent's waiting room by this effect is a climax, deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText:
Hina: "Let's look at the stars together! I'll tell you all about them!"
Sayo: "...I suppose I should. The floor is yours."

name: "Change the World" CHU²
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your 《Anniversary》 or 《RAISE A SUILEN》 characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【AUTO】 When you use "Accelerate", if there are 1 or less markers underneath this card, you may choose 1 card in your waiting room, and put it face up underneath this card as a marker. 【AUTO】 [Put 2 markers from underneath this card into your waiting room] At the end of your turn, you may pay the cost. If you do, return all cards from your waiting room to your deck, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Hello, everyone! I have some sweet news for you before the encore!

name: "Into a Steady Secretary" Arisa Ichigaya
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 event from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, return all cards from your waiting room to your deck, and shuffle your deck. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Ah, crap! The papers!

name: "Special Memories" Tae Hanazono
text: 【CONT】 If your waiting room has 6 or more climax, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Anniversary》 or 《Poppin'Party》 characters, this card gets +2500 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 [(3) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 3 damage to your opponent." (Damage may be canceled) 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your clock into your stock.
flavorText: Tae: "But it was Arisa who thought you all would like to see it."

name: "Look of Affection" PAREO
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 level 1 or higher card from your hand into your waiting room] During your main phase, when this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Pastel＊Palettes》 or 《RAISE A SUILEN》 character with level equal to or lower than your level in your waiting room, and during that main phase, you may play that card from your waiting room without fulfilling color requirements. (If cost is needed to play the card, pay the cost. Climax are regarded as level 0) 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck.
flavorText: What ever is the matter? CHU²-sama?

name: "Well-Loved Sheet Music" Rui Yashio
text: 【AUTO】 When your climax is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1500 power until the end of your opponent's next turn. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When your character's trigger check reveals a climax, you may pay the cost. If you do, draw 1 card.
flavorText: I have not been keeping it a secret. It is not special training either. It is just out of habit.

name: "With the Rain" Sayo Hikawa
text: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to their hand. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Anniversary》 or 《Roselia》 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose 1 of your other 《Anniversary》 or 《Roselia》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I just happened to be in the area... The stalls seemed especially lively, so I suppose you could say my curiosity got the better of me...

name: "Into a Great President" Rinko Shirokane
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Anniversary》 or 《Roselia》 characters you have ×500.
flavorText: If we clean them up quickly, there shouldn't be... Ah!

name: "The World is Ours!" CHU²
text: 【AUTO】 Accelerate [Put 1 《Anniversary》 or 《RAISE A SUILEN》 character from your waiting room at the bottom of your clock] At the beginning of your climax phase, if this card is in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Anniversary》 or 《RAISE A SUILEN》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, put it into your waiting room, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: You think I'd go down without a fight?

name: "Masterpiece Predictions" Tae Hanazono
text: 【CONT】 If you have another ""Star Beginning to Shine" LAYER" in your center stage, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your attack phase, if this card is 【STAND】, and you do not have another character in your center stage, choose up to 2 level 1 or lower characters in your opponent's center stage, put them into their waiting room, choose up to 1 cost 0 or lower 《Anniversary》 character in your waiting room, and put it in an open position of your stage.
flavorText: We've made quite a lot of ornaments over here. Now we just have to paint them.

name: "Tanzaku From the Past" Arisa Ichigaya
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Anniversary》 or 《Poppin'Party》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Anniversary》 or 《Poppin'Party》 characters you have ×500.
flavorText: Argh, what a waste of energy! I thought it was going to be something more emotional!

name: "Bouquet for a Friend" Yukina Minato
text: 【AUTO】 When your climax is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn. 【ACT】 [(1) 【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to their hand.
flavorText: No need to be so modest. You should hold your head high.

name: "A Declaration of War" Lisa Imai
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if there is a climax in your opponent's climax area, choose 1 of your 《Anniversary》 or 《Roselia》 characters in battle, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavorText:
Hmmm, what to choose~.
What'd you go with, Himari?

name: "I Have to Say It...!" Mashiro Kurata
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Anniversary》 or 《Morfonica》 characters get +1000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When your character's trigger check reveals a climax, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.
flavorText: U-um...

name: "Morning Call" Tsukushi Futaba
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have 4 or more other 《Anniversary》 or 《Morfonica》 characters, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2 soul until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [Put this card into your waiting room] When your other 《Anniversary》 or 《Morfonica》 character is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Why's she calling so early in the morning...?

name: "Spiraling Concern" Ako Udagawa
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [Put this card into your waiting room] When your other 《Anniversary》 or 《Roselia》 character is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: ... Ako, you doofus! Why'd you blurt that out?!

name: Bridge of Emotions
text: 【COUNTER】 If you do not have an 《Anniversary》 or 《Roselia》 character, this card cannot be played from your hand. Put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room, choose up to 1 level X or lower 《Anniversary》 or 《Roselia》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the total level of the cards put into your waiting room by this effect. (Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText: Fufu, I suppose performing like this every once in a while can't hurt.

name: Translating Languages
text: If you have 3 or less 《Anniversary》 or 《Morfonica》 characters, this card cannot be played from your hand. You may choose 1 of your ""A+ Leadership" Tsukushi Futaba", and put it into your waiting room. If you do, choose 1 character in your waiting room with "Tsukushi(つくし)" in its card name, and put it in any position of your stage.
flavorText: Umm... Do you mean these sheets at the back here? By translated, do you mean- Huh, do you speak French, Rui-san?

name: Our Future Destination
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Yukina: "Fufu... I'm counting on everyone."

name: Bread-Carrying Race!
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Does being tall help?

name: Necromancer of the Abyss
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +2 soul.
flavorText: Ako: "It means you play dead and the enemies are no longer able to notice you. It's one of my best skills!"

name: Bask in the Light
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Mashiro: "Please enjoy the show. Our first song is..."

name: Proof of My Skills!
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: A Session with Everyone
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: To That Joyous Place!
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)
flavorText: Kokoro: "C'mon, let's go!"

name: Staying True to Us
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText: Ran: "Are they all here for Girls Band Expo?"

name: A Tasty Time
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText: LAYER: "You always ask to meet on such short notice, Hana-chan."

name: At Long Last!
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: Pre-Show Excitement
text: 【AUTO】When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the【STANDBY】effect. (【STANDBY】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with a level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as【REST】)
flavorText: Aya: "There are T-shirts, towels, hats, wristbands... All the usual stuff. Looks like there are bands selling socks and other unique goods too!"

name: Our Future Destination

If you do, choose 1 ""Bang! On the Scene" Kokoro Tsurumaki" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand) 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your 《Anniversary》 or 《Poppin'Party》 characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I would absolutely love to turn these feelings into a song!

text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your climax phase, if you have 2 or more other 《Anniversary》 or 《Pastel＊Palettes》 characters, choose 1 of your ""Sakura Season Returns" Kasumi Toyama" or ""Our Future Together" Yukina Minato", and that character gets +1000 power and +1 soul until end of turn. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 5 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, draw up to 1 card.
flavorText: I'll work hard too!

text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 2 or more other 《Anniversary》 or 《Afterglow》 characters, you may draw 1 card. If you do, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your 《Anniversary》 or 《Afterglow》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Something's up. What happened?

name: "Costume Designer" Yukina Minato
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 2 times per turn. When your other 《Anniversary》 or 《Roselia》 character is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] When your other 《Anniversary》 or 《Roselia》 character is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, return that character to your hand.
flavorText: And we were the ones who created this stage.

name: "Wild Pop" LAYER
text: 【CONT】 All of your opponent's characters get "【AUTO】 Encore [(2)]".
flavorText: I'll do it, but let's make sure it doesn't affect practice later on.

name: "A Tough Punk?" Ran Mitake
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if you have an 《Anniversary》 or 《Afterglow》 character, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1000, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Arisa, you should tell me more about bonsai gardening sometime. I might learn something I can use in flower arranging.

name: "Our Future Together" Yukina Minato
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if you have 2 or more other 《Anniversary》 or 《Roselia》 characters, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Always by Your Side" is in your climax area, and you have 2 or more other 《Anniversary》 or 《Roselia》 characters, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 2 《Anniversary》 or 《Roselia》 characters, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: And it must be you by my side playing the bass, Lisa.

name: "Bang! On the Scene" Kokoro Tsurumaki
flavorText: Anyhoo... Bang! Okay?

name: "Conveying Passion" Mashiro Kurata
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Draw 1 card, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavorText: I'm so happy for you, Toko-chan...!

text: 【CONT】 This card gets +2500 power for each other 《Anniversary》 or 《Hello, Happy World!》 character in your back stage.
flavorText: What a wonderful idea!

text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, search your deck for up to 1 《Anniversary》 or 《Poppin'Party》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 At the end of this card's attack, if "Memories From Back Then" is in your climax area, put the same number of cards as this card's soul from the bottom of your opponent's deck into their waiting room, and deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to the number of climax among those cards. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: I clearly remember everyone laughing as the sakura petals were floating around... That day really was like something out of a dream~

text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 [(2) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 2 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Aya: "Right?! That's good to see~!"

name: Memories From Back Then
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +2 soul.
flavorText: Maybe this is a thank-you present from the toys to us!

name: Always by Your Side
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: As long as we don't forget, that landscape will always live on in our hearts.
